title: where is the battlecast poro icon
body:
rito pls
I am getting so frustrated right now, I've tried everything and I'm going overseas tomorrow until like the 14th

replies.body:
Guys its there for me.
Try re-logging into your client.
I am just letting you know, I've bought the bundle knowing that I've had 250RP cheated from me, I've sent a ticket about it. I hope Rito OCE actually does something about this >:[

> [{quoted}](name=vQwaKe,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=y78dVsKE,comment-id=00030005,timestamp=2014-12-16T13:31:17.823+0000)
>
> I am just letting you know, I've bought the bundle knowing that I've had 250RP cheated from me, I've sent a ticket about it. I hope Rito OCE actually does something about this >:[


This has been fixed and the discount is applying correctly. We are sorry this has caused you pain.

I have asked some engineers to investigate why the discount was failing.
However I still haven't gotten 250RP back :[

> [{quoted}](name=vQwaKe,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=y78dVsKE,comment-id=0003000500000000,timestamp=2014-12-17T00:13:47.374+0000)
>
> However I still haven't gotten 250RP back :[

If you have sent a ticket to support, they will look into it for you.
I have, they haven't responded so far, sent the ticket in yesteryday around 12PM AEST

Not there, pls help i rly want it xc
edit: how about we play a game with u and u can gift us the icon >:]
same
It's not there for me either, even after restarting/relogging.
It is still not there.
Still waiting. Funny how the only good looking Poro icon is unavailable to buy separately.

Riot post being downvoted? 

*MIND BLOWN*
Why didnt u get make eahc icon 1500 :[ or you get one free for a christmas gift that would ahve been cool

Hi All,
Just letting you know the battle cast poro icon is showing in the store correctly now.
Some of the poro wards are still missing though, same with Dark Candy Fiddlesticks
What if some people thought that the battlecast icon was needed to be bought with the bundle and some people bought the bundle to get the battlecast icon >

There is only 3 Poro ward skins.
Poro Ward
Astronaut Poro Ward
Gentleman Poro Ward

All are showing as they should.


I just checked dark candy fiddle sticks and he was showing for me, but just to be sure I disabled and re-enabled the skin and checked in multiple clients and he is showing each time.
I'm leaving tomorrow aswell...

I wanted this Icon myself. EVERY other Poro Icon was available in the shop so I assumed the Battlecast one was some kind of reward.

So yeah, I wasted my last 250 RP on a crappy Ghost one :-\
Not just the icon, a couple of the poro wards are missing too, not to mention Dark Candy Fiddlesticks is missing as well
i couldn't find it but i just bought the bundle :)
its not discounting for me, so i wont save sh*t
all the others are there :/

I NEEEEEEEED IT
it should be available seen as the snowdown page lists its cost at 250rp
i was wondering the same thing :(
